item.title: Analysing GoT scripts (1)
item.author: jespasareig@gmail.com (Josep Espasa Reig)
item.description: Introduction something about GoT/what is GoT? My main reason to love Game of Thrones is that is a serie with ruthless and unpredictable narratives. It shows a world with a large amount of rich and absorbing characters that are always on the edge between life and death. Criticism however, has sparked after the last two seasons1. The show seems to have become more fast-paced, spending less time in slowly-building complex stories and more in action-like scenes.
